description:
Be part of a great community and live life to the full with this super convenient villa featuring quality amenities in the heart of a well-established, leafy location.
Located on the ground floor, this one-bedroom property within the popular Parkland Villas complex offers a comfortable and safe environment, low-maintenance living, and excellent resident amenities including a communal swimming pool and bowling green.

Light and bright, bedroom one is generously proportioned, with secure window screens and an air conditioner. A spacious adjoining bathroom features a shower, vanity, WC with safety rails, vanity and laundry tub with washer/dryer attachments. There are built-in robes and reverse cycle air conditioning in the bedroom, alongside sliding glass door access to a private terrace.

A practical kitchen with smart timber laminate flooring provides an electric stovetop and oven, ample pantry, bench and top and bottom cupboard space, and an open plan flow to the living area.

Outside, find a neat, covered and paved terrace surrounded by established greenery, while in the communal areas, relax in the heated swimming pool, meet friends for lunch in the alfresco courtyard, play a game of lawn bowls, hone your computer skills, wind down in the library or make new friends in the Clubhouse, where even more activities and leisure options are available.

Purpose-built for over 55's, Parkland Villas operates under the WA Retirement Villages Act, through which you will receive a freehold purple title for your home. Here, live securely among like-minded people, partake in a host of social activities, enjoy a quick trip to Westfield Booragoon, stroll to peaceful parks and still be only a short trip from the CBD and Fremantle.

Key Features:
• Communal swimming pool
• Bowling green
• Built in robes to bedroom 1
• Large bathroom (with safety rails)
• Self-contained laundry
• Air conditioning
• Good storage
• Great social and recreational amenities
• Established, leafy suburb
• 24-hour emergency call system
• Street and walkway lighting
• Active Neighbourhood Watch culture

Location Plus (approx. distances):
• Len Shearer Reserve 350m
• Leach Highway (bus stops) 1.1km
• The Good Grocer, Myaree 1.2km
• Wireless Hill Park 1.5km
• Tompkins Park, Applecross (river walk) 1.7km
• Westfield Booragoon 1.8km
• Point Walter Golf Course 7.5km
• Fremantle 9.8km
• Perth CBD 16.1km


Council Rates: $1,591.90p.a.
Monthly Service Fee at Parkland Villa Booragoon, as at 1 July 2022: $394.65. (The fee includes water consumption charges, admin and manangement of the village, operating and cleaning costs of all common areas and amenities)

To organise a site visit or for more information, please contact Agnes Lee on 0403 965 364 or email at agneslee@maxirealty.com.au

DISCLAIMER: We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained herein is true and accurate, neither the Agent nor the client nor servants of both, guarantee their accuracy. Interested persons are advised to make their own enquiries and satisfy themselves in all respects. The particulars contained are not intended to form part of any contract.
